snippet: Joey Votto, the Reds’ All-Star first baseman and the 2010 National League most valuable player, has torn cartilage and will miss three to four weeks.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Arizona Diamondbacks defeat Cincinnati Reds, 5-3; Reds All-Star first baseman Joey Votto is sidelined with knee injury for three to four weeks; other baseball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Joey Votto, the Reds’ All-Star first baseman and the 2010 National League most valuable player, has torn cartilage and will miss three to four weeks.

headline.seo: Joey Votto of Reds Needs Knee Surgery
headline.main: Votto Faces Knee Surgery and Will Be Out 3-4 Weeks
headline.print_headline: Cincinnati Loses a Game and Votto
